name: F?d?ration europ?enne des industries des aliments pour animaux familiers
goal:
1. The aim of association shall be to carry out studies, particularly in the scientific, technical, institutional and legal fields, on all matters of concern to the pet food industry.

The specific objective is international economic integration, especially within the European Union, and also research and the implementation of the solutions resulting from that research.

2. Its activities shall consist of carrying out studies, making contacts, carrying out negotiations and transactions, in the interests of its members. It shall therefore rely basically on the co-operation and/or co-ordination of its members? activities. The Federation shall represent its members before the Authorities of the European Union and before other international institutions and associations.

3. The Federation shall not carry out any profit-making activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade
